title: Figgity Mouse??
body: I'm not sure whats causing it but its very annoying... In game, my mouse keeps getting really jumpy and it's really hard to hit skill shots and farm. I notice it more when im making small movements and it seems to only happen while in game. I thought my mouse was broke so i bought a new mouse and pad today but im still having issues. Anyone know what it could be? It could be happening when im not playing league too i just don't notice because it woulnt effect much because they are just tiny movements. Its kinda like my mouse movement isn't consistent everytime.

replies.body: Which mouse/mice are you using and are you using any software to configure your mouse sensitivity or settings?
i was using logitech but the one i just bought today is microsoft... nah i dont use any software for it, just auto install through wizard thing

Gotcha. Since this persisted through two different mice, it's possible this is caused by a background program. I'd recommend [**performing a clean boot**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to ensure no background apps are at play here.

Let me know if this caused any noticeable change for your mouse.
